授業目的: This course introduces students to the complex and dynamic relations between Japan and China in modern times. It will mainly examine social and  cultural relations, although politics and economics will also be referenced as appropriate.
到達目標: By taking this course, students will gain a general understanding of some of the key issues in Japan-China relations in the global context as well as the main scholarly debates on such issues. They will also have an opportunity to improve on their writing and analytical skills.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
【合併】総合日本学習科目（日中関係論）（CIEC）/Japan-China Relations（国際学部）

第1回: Explanation of syllabus and introductory remarks. Classes will be conducted face-to-face from the 1st week.
第8回: Japan's understanding of early 20th century China
第11回: Japan's postwar people's diplomacy toward China
第12回: China's reform and Opening and Japan
